messages.name: UIString
messages.message: Warrior - Powerful and offensive melee fighter. His immense strength and stamina makes him a good tanker in battle. <Difficulty: Beginner>
Archer - Ranged fighter with high Agility and capable of dealing huge damage. Her low Strength and Stamina makes her weak in melee attacks. <Difficulty: Beginner>
Sorceress - Her low Stamina and Defense may put her in danger at times in battles but her ability to deal huge magic damage makes up for her weakness. <Difficulty: Intermediate>

Cleric - Excellent support abilities due to his high Defense and Healing skills. Though damage is weak, his variety of magic allows him to get through situations in the battlefield. <Difficulty: Expert>
Nicknames must be between 4-10 characters. No special characters allowed.
Special characters are not allowed in nickname.
您累计在线时间已满3小时，请您下线休息，做适当身体活动。
您已经进入疲劳游戏时间，您的游戏收益将降为正常值的50％，为了您的健康，请尽快下线休息，做适当身体活动，合理安排学习生活。
您已进入不健康游戏时间，为了您的健康，请您立即下线休息。如不下线，您的身体将受到损害，您的收益已降为零，直到您的累计下线时间满5小时后，才能恢复正常
The channel is full, unable to enter.
Blessing time! Have a break please!
You have hit the Blessing Limit! You shall receive 0% of the in-game benefits if you continue playing. Stay offline for 5 accumulated hours to restore your status.
You have entered the %s key which is being used for %s function. Do you want to change to the following key?
Please select the character to create.
※ There is a limit to the number of characters that can be created for each account.
Fatigue has been used up so Guild Festival Mission will no longer be completed.
The higher the level of memory optimization, the more memory you can save.

Fatigue(FTG): Consumed each time you enter a dungeon. You'll still be able to enter a dungeon if your FTG runs out, but the item drop rate will be lower. Weekly FTG will be reset at 9am every Saturday.
You have been blessed by Altea, this shall earn you bonus EXP from dungeons. The blessing is bestowed upon you on a daily and weekly basis.
Unable to use the item again today.
Press the %s key to switch back to combat state.
Toggle video recording with the [Scroll Lock] key.
Enter the %s key to switch to the previous Hotkey window.
[Skill icon, right click to view video]

Kali – Her graceful moves are not only mesmerizing but deadly to enemies, as she summons powerful spirits to aid her in combat. Her strength and intelligence values will greatly affect her battle abilities. <Difficulty: Beginner>
어쌔신은 피와 광기의 불꽃과 그림자를 날개삼아 소리없이 재빠르게 적의 목숨을 노린다. 힘과 민첩의 영향을 많이 받는다. <중급자 추천>
Are you sure you want to abandon the quest?
Click on the NPC who has a ? above their heads.
List Stage quest at the top
Check the Stage difficulty level needed to complete the quest before you enter the Stage.
There's no quest in progress currently.
Click and drag an item here to discard it.
Maximum Gold Storage Limit : %d Gold\nThe limit will increase as you level up
Unable to sort items now. Please try again later.
Unable to sort items after placing an item in a different window.
Trading House Special Coupon expired or not in inventory.
You have obtained Level Up Reward Box. Please check it in the Inventory's Cash tab.
You have left the Party and returned to town.
Repeating the same message may cause disruption to others.
Unable to command when in ghost state.
Sending out too many messages within a short time may be disruptive to others. (%d seconds left)
Using too many gestures within a short time may be disruptive to others. (%d seconds left)
You do not meet the level requirement.
You do not have the required skill book.
※ Right-click the skill icon to view Skill Video Clip window.
※ Use your mouse wheel to toggle between PvE and PvP skill stats.
Expansion Skill Tree has been activated. Click Skill Option to use it.
You have no skill points used.
You do not have enough storage space.
Please set the name of the Skill Tree to use.
Cannot be opened as there are Skill Points that have been used.
You can recommend or open saved Skill Tree from the Skill Tree page.
You can craft useful items if you learn secondary skill.
Where do you want to go?
[%s]\n Are you going to take the challenge?\n(You will be returned to town or stage entrance if you cancel)
Opens when the prior levels are cleared
Able to progress to the next level when Challenge is selected after clearing a level.
Able to get bonus every fifth round (Albtraum excluded)
Able to select the next level after the previous level is cleared.
There is a Challenge Mission in Dark Lair. Look at the Mission Window carefully.
Maximum attack power due to equipment is reduced by %d times, and maximum damage due to buff and debuff is reduced by %d times.
HP recovery rate is reduced to %d%% in this dungeon.

Dark Lair <Infinite Pormido>'s ranking is calculated until 6am of the first day of each month, and gifts will be rewarded according to the ranking. From 6am to 9am on the first day of every month when the counting and initialisation of the ranking are carried out, entry to Dark Lair <Infinite Pormido> will be restricted.

You will automatically break from the current party if you choose to revive in town. You will not get the bonuses your current party will receive upon clearing the dungeon. To read this message again while waiting, press ESC.
Exchange of equipment is not possible while incapacitated.
There is a user who cannot enter the selected town.
Can revive when [%s] key is pressed after purchasing the resurrection scroll
You must complete the entrance quest first.
Difficulty level and item drop rate will differ according to the number of players in Abyss mode.
Difficulty level for Hatred Pirandello will depend on the number of players.
카오스는 입장 인원에 따라 난이도와 아이템 드랍률이 달라집니다. 카오스 난이도 전용 일일 퀘스트와 챌린지 퀘스트만 진행이 가능합니다.
카오스 난이도에서는 전용 일일 퀘스트와 챌린지 퀘스트만 진행이 가능합니다.
Unable to change title while incapacitated.
Unable to destroy equipment while incapacitated.
Cannot use item. The extended skill tree is already selected.
Extended the skill tree and symbol slot. Please check.
Confirm changes? All skill effects that were applied will be removed.
Unable to change your skill tree while dead.
Initialisation of the skill tree is only available in the town.
Please choose a skill tree to be initialised.
After initialisation, the skill tree can't be restored. Confirm initialisation?
This is an expanded skill tree. \nIt can be activated with Skill Tree Expansion Coupon bought from the Cash Shop.#d \n#y(Skill change can be done in the village.)#d
This item has expired and can be no longer used.This item will be deleted from the inventory upon moving to a different zone.
Basic Skill Tree. \n#y(Able to switch the skill in towns)#d

A skill that can only be learnt through Skill Book.\nSkill Books can be obtained from the blacksmiths in towns through #y[Item Production]#w.\nProduction material can be obtained at #vHatred Pirandello 3rd Floor#w.

A skill that can only be learnt through Skill Book.\nSkill Books can be obtained from the blacksmiths in towns through #y[Item Production]#w.\nProduction material can be obtained at #vGarden of Time and Space (Lv.60)>Deceptive Stronghold#w.
#y%d Gold#w will be used for skill initialization.\nDo you want to initialize Hero Skills?
You can learn new skills from class Masters or skill books.
Click the skill to learn it.
You need a skill book to cancel.
The skill must be learnt first.
The prerequisites must be learnt first.
You have exceeded the SP limit; unable to acquire the skill.
You have exceeded the SP limit; unable to advance the skill level.
You cannot learn this skill because you have acquired a different Ultimate Skill.
Limits the acquisition of other Ultimate Skills of the same level.
Do you want to learn this skill?\nThis will limit the acquisition of other Ultimate Skills of the same level.
Do you really want to reset the #y%s#d의 %d ~ %d job skill? %d ~ %d worker skill will reset to SP. Cannot return to previous condition after resetting.
You do not have enough gold for skill initialization.
Can be used by %s. \nExpanded skill slot cannot be used once it expires, but the skills acquired will not be initialized. \nThe slot has to be activated to initialize the skill.

List of players you partied with recently (%s/20 people)
List of players who added you as a friend

You have automatically quit the Hero Academy as you have reached Level %d. You can get rewards when you join or create a normal guild for the first time. Please check the guild recruitment board to find out more about greater rewards and stronger heroes waiting for you.
To get the reward, Guild Storage [Guild Level 3] expansion has to be purchased.
Party maintained %d%% (Hero Academy %d%%) / Friend registration %d%% bonus EXP will be added.
%s has been added to your Friends List.
Nickname copied successfully. You may now paste it.
Increase maximum number of guild members?
The maximum number of guild members has been increased to %d.
Increase Max No. of guild members.
<%s> Guild Join request has been accepted.
<%s> Guild Join request has been rejected.
Guild Join request has been accepted.
Guild join request has been rejected.
Guild recruitment has ended due to the maximum number of Guild members allowed.

#s[%s]#w
Benefits will be shown while you are in a guild.

#s[Guild Benefits]#w
Additional EXP bonus can be attained when Hero Academy members party up together. Receive more various rewards compared to a normal guild.

#s[Automatic quit conditions]#w
When Level %d has been attained

#yYou cannot rejoin Hero Academy after quitting.
#yIf you quit or have been automatically quit, check the guild notice board at Guild tab in Community [O].
#yHero Academy cannot participate in the Guild War.
You can get various benefits if you join a normal guild.

If you are new to Dragon Nest and want to share information with other beginners in the game and play a part in creating a lively community, please join the beginner guild. Join gift : HP, MP cash potions

There is not enough space in the Server Storage.
There is not enough money for the Server Storage usage commission.
You cannot put bound items in the Server Storage.
You need Server Storage usage coints to use the Server Storage.
Do you really want to place it in the Server Storage?
How many do you want to put in the Server Storage?
You need to have Server Storage usage coins to place items in the Server Storage.
You have to be above Level %d to be able to place items in the Server Storage.
You have to be above Level %d to be able to withdraw items from the Server Storage.
1 Server Storage usage coin will be deducted.
Commission will be charged whenever an item is put inside.
1 will be used for the use of every storage space.
Do you really want to withdraw from the Server Storage?
How many do you want to withdraw from the Server Storage?
You can place or withdraw items from the Server Storage by right clicking the item.
Insufficient money to buy this item.
Insufficient inventory space for this purchase.
Do you really want to sell that?
How many do you wish to buy?
How many do you wish to sell?
Up to [%d] can be purchased at a time.
Up to [%d] can be sold at a time.
Maximum gold limit will be exceeded; unable to sell items.
You cannot trade right now. Please try again later.
Repair items that are currently equipped?
You have repaired items that you currently equipped.
You have repaired all your items.
Your weapon's durability is reduced to 0. The Attack Power of your weapon has decreased.
A piece of your armor's durability is reduced to 0. The Defense of your armor has decreased.
All items are at full durability.

Can't purchase due to profession difference
Can't purchase due to under level

Combined skills are automatically attained when combined level increases.
